tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I feel lucky living in Vasant Kunj because of close proximity and able to find a gem like Dr.Mamta Mishra. Not only me me but my baby feel connected to her voice and aura during those 9 months.
i am giving this feedback in two parts, one how she is as a person and another as a doctor.

Person:- I feel your behaviour matters when you are doctor, at the end they are also human being with medical gift. She is outrightly one of most modest person despite being so successful. I love the way she handles financial subjects very clear cut ,considerate and realist. You can ask and she will clarify all the financial queries of yours. Infact she will be considerate about your money and her response is so apt. She is practical and yet you are her precious patient whom she cares a lot. She has a bit of philosophical side which puts you at such a ease while talking to her

Doctor- complete knowledge about her field, you just have to ask the right question. I have visited her clinic mostly and fortis hospital in the 3rd trimester. During every visit she will do her observation with concentration then will give you time to ask your queries. I feel she finds her clinic very close to her heart and very caring in that space. She did forget me as a patient during the initial trimester but again cant pinpoint her for that. I liked her as a person and her positive aura as a doctor. I have understood her nature and showed my honest trust on her advice. 

Procedure: My 9 month of pregnancy was less complicated and same feeling was created by Dr. Mamta Mishra. There was subserosal fibroid but that didn’t interfere with pregnancy. I chose to  get delivered by Ma’am hence chose fortis as my delivery hospital. At the end there was slight issue of gestational diabetics which might have been resulted in insulin injection but not needed at the end. After 38 week I was given induced labor pain under the guidance of Mamta ma’am which was successful and i delivered a healthy baby after 12 hrs of induction process. There was flow of blood from Utreus after delivery whose reason was unknown. But ma’am was able to stop the blood flow and stopped the mishappening , the procedure took another 1 hr and episiotomy stitched given by ma’am was perfectly intact. I am writing this 1 week after my delivery. 

I would recommend every aspiring pregnant women to her for better guidance and relaxing 9 months. If any further information needed please reach out.

Thankyou Mamta Ma’am
Every meeting with you was soothing in its own way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After loosing trust on almost every doctor knowing they work for money! Then you meet Dr. Mamta mishra and all your belief's in doctor's are restored.
This goes same as every politician is corrupt except few who try to maintain moral ethics and work to help others. She is one of them! The only doctor (out of all those i know) who follow medical ethics.
You will NEVER be disappointed consulting her.
She motivated me and my wife for normal delivery throughout and at the time of delivery i was about to give up seeing my wife in pain and then she came and motivated my wife to go for normal delivery though we delivered it in fortis and i have had very bad experience with fortis that i had it in mind that the doctor will go for C section at the end saying there is no other option without even trying as what a trend is going on but mam(Dr.mamta mishra) did not even offer C section and went for normal delivery.
At the end of the day we have a baby and she has all our respect for restoring faith in doctors.

Now lets come to financials
She will try to save your money as much as you try
Let me give you an example which touched me and my wife. One day we had an ultrasound scheduled and mam did ultrasound for more than a hour and at the end she wanted some more clarification in ultrasound so she recommended 2nd advice and after standing for more than an hour she did not charge a single penny.
And there are n number of incidents like this
And before consulting her we went to a doctor who was charging money for almost every thing in fact she tried to go for a specific labs for test to get commission.

She(Dr Mamta Mishra) is always on your side! If you go once you will never consult any other doctor

I am writing this review while she is examining my wife for discharge and the word she said that she does not want to keep my wife admitted because she doesn't want to put more burden on our pockets!

And to help you!
Fortis charged Rs.64000 (as we took general ward package which is totally great as fortis maintains high cleanliness quality standards) for delivery including everything as we had a normal delivery. This cost will increase by Rs.12000 if you opt for epidural which we didn't and also Rs.10000 willbe added if you go for C Section

Thank you mam and staff of fortis which is as nice as Dr.Mamta mishra mam

This 9899020718 is my no if you need any guidance(This is the least i can do fr the Dr.Mamta Mishra)

Sumit Grover

tags: None
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Exercise,Pregnant,
review:
I am thankful to Dr Mamta Mishra. She maintains the standard of Medical Ethics in this commercial world Ours. I believe we have very few doctors like her in today's world. 
I would like to give her feedback on following grounds.

1. Subject Knowledge : 
She is MRCOG from UK and this is evident while she talks to her Patients.  She keep herself updated with the recent studies in Gynecology. Avoid giving unnecessary medications   or treatment.  Her Knowledge in the field of Gynecology is brilliant. Before visiting her I Visited many Gynecologists of NCR. But no one impressed as DR Mishra did. After meeting her My respect for this Noble Profession has increased thousand times .

2. Honesty & Work Ethics

Her honest Qualities and Work ethics also impressed me. Dr Mishra Practices the Hippocratic oath in reality. "Patient  is  supreme not money" is her motto. She is a doctor with moral values and medical ethics. I am fortunate to have our baby delivered(Normal delivery)  by her on Nov 7th 2015. She guides correctly and never ever will keep you in the dark which the majority of the doctors do. I salute such doctors for whom the patient is supreme.

3. Work Style: She is available 24*7. If her mobile is off by chance she  responds you back, the moment she sees you call.  Her clear dealings and work style also impressed me. She guides very patiently over the phone as well.

To Conclude : If you are looking for gynecologist you must Visit DR Mishra otherwise you will miss the BEST DOCTOR IN NCR. We use travel from Ghaziabad to Vasant Kunj for her consultation 

Once Again : My High REGARDS for DR. Mamta Mishra

Suyash prasad

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from severe period pain due to endometriosis & Fibroids and was unable to conceive due to this disease.
I visited too many famous doctors in Delhi and NCR. They all mentioned that I will have to undergo an “Open myomectomy” and may need to remove the uterus or ovary along with Fibroids & Endo, and the chances for pregnancy very low or no chances.
I was not in favour of open myomectomy and no one gave me a positive hope.

One of my friend asked me to visit Dr Mamta Mishra. And I thought lets just try for the last time before I decide.
Then I visited Dr Mamta and she reviewed all my ultrasound reports in detailed and provided me detailed information about the Endometriosis & Fibroids. I was so happy and positive to see how a busy doctor can spend so much time on your case. She mentioned that I have to undergo Endometriosis and fibroid removal surgery because the fibroids & Endo are too big in size and they are blocking my pregnancy. She said she will try for laparoscopic myomectomy but the chances are low. I was so positive with Dr Mamta and decided to get this surgery done. March 2021 was the month of my surgery, Dr Mamta tried her best and removed all my fibroids with “Laparoscopic Myomectomy”. The surgery took almost 6-7 hour but she spent her whole day on my surgery so that I don’t have to suffer with “Open myomectomy”. After my surgery, she asked me to be positive for my pregnancy as she tried her best to not to touch my uterus, tubes and ovaries during suregry. 

In July 2021, I got pregnant naturally. ** **** **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** *** ** ** **** *** I would highly recommend all to please do not loose hopes and must visit Dr Mamta Mishra before you decide anything. She is a life and dream saver!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Rather than review, we as couples would rather call it a note of gratitude for Dr. Mamta Mishra. If you want to trust the natural process of delivery, you will not find a doc as good as her. The pregnancy experience which she creates will have a life long impact on you as few things like “trust your body” is very rare to come straight from doctor’s mouth. 

We had heard so much around pregnancy around us that we were actually afraid if we will be able to manage that. But her simple advices, 24/7 availability for your problems, calm and composed approch to your issues, her motivation in labor room and no extra expense are just few to state.

Only doc I have visited recently who does not have any tie up with any lab and you can get your tests done anywhere you want, No issues of medicines being available at a particular shop (you will easily get anywhere and they are not expensive), no supplements till it is actually required as she will motivate you to get those from natural food are again just few things you will love about her.

It would not have been possible for us to have such a smooth vaginal delivery experience without her.

Do visit her for a stress free and pocket friendly delivery experience.

Regards 
Proud parents of Vedant Singh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When I got pregnant for the 2nd time , I was looking for a gynac who had compassion along with expertise. I had a few bad experiences in the past which made me very vary as mine was a late pregnancy. I looked her up in practo and decided to visit her. It was probably the best decision I could have made.

Dr Mamta Mishra is an extremely intelligent and compassionate doctor. She made my pregnancy a cake walk with her ********* *** calmness.  She was always available at any given time of the day and night for me. I had a few complications towards the fag end and she pulled me through them with complete ease.

She is a very big promoter of normal delivery and councled me about the same. She does not promote unnecessary medication and tests. 

I had to undergo anot emergency  c section due to my heath condition and she did the same with complete ease. Her follow up post delivery is exceptional and despite being in a big hospital she does whatever she can herself for her patients. She was very patient and welcoming even with post delivery issues.

She is a superb doc and a a fabulous human being which makes her apt for expectant mothers coz she makes each mother and child experience special with her expertise and care.

Thank you ma'am , in this day and age you truly are a remarkable doctor and human being .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Mamta Mishra for pregnancy checkup.Dr. mamta is highly professional, very confident, thoroughly updated and a wonderful doctor. she is very straight forward in her consultations and explains the process, the risks and will recommend the best.She never forces her opinion Like she asked me what delivery method will I prefer. She encourages for normal delivery if it is medically safe and if not she will recommend a caesarian. She is not biased.In my case she put in all efforts to deliver my baby normally and after putting in all time and effort when baby was still not coming she swiftly went and prepared the operation theatre for emergency caesarian. She did not jump to doing caesarian without trying nor did she delay when she knew cesarian was inevitable.Another good thing is She always responds to all telephonic conversations despite her busy schedule. She will see the reports online and respond even at odd hours and won't ask you to come to clinic unnecessarily.I am extremely thankful to Dr. Mamta for making the process so smooth for me .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After 33 weeks of pregnancy  and having not so good experience with our present gynae, we started looking for someone who is experienced and who we can trust at this stage.One of my colleagues suggested us to go to Dr. Mamta Mishra and after meeting Mam for the first time we were so relieved and confident. 

My wife was suffering from GDM and she was on metformin.Madam told us not to worry much and eat freely and keep on monitoring sugar levels.After that we did not worry and by God's grace sugar remained in control and finally we gave birth to a baby boy with normal delivery. 

Qualities which we like most about Dr. Mamta Mishra are as follows:
a) She is straightforward and never tried to be extra sweet or strict.After talking with her we always have clarity and built a trust on her.
b) She always tries her level best for normal delivery and always encouraged us to have patience.
c) She is very experienced and clarified every doubts we ever asked.
d) During labour and after delivery provided full guidance and support.Thanks to Fortis Vasant Kunj staff also. 

We are thankful to God that at right time we met Dr. Mamta Mishra and everything went smoothly after that. 

Thank you so much Madam!!!!We will always be obliged to you. 

Proud Parents
Neha Tanwar and Shakti Singh

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
First pregnancy is always tricky, but a good doctor can make the whole journey rewarding with the right support, genuine advise and compassion. Dr. Mamta Mishra is one of such doctors. I started consulting in my 5th month after having an unsatisfactory experience with my previous gynaecologist who categorized my pregnancy as high risk and suggested complete bed rest. It was only after I met Dr. Mamta that I started feeling confident being pregnant and got back on my feet, doing regular chores without any unnecessary fears. She doesn't treat pregnancy as sickness and encourage you to enjoy the journey to its fullest. 

Fast forward to labour and delivery woes during last trimester, she made us understand our options and helped us take the right decisions at the right time. Unlike most Gynaecologist in India, she and her entire team were very flexible and encouraged me to try out different methods to cope up with painful contractions. My labour and delivery experience was beyond satisfactory and I am glad that with the right support I could deliver normally without any unnecessary medication or need for an emergency C-section. Recovery has been great too! 

I would highly recommend Dr. Mamta Mishra to all women looking for a compassionate and genuine doctor to support their pregnancy. * **** ****** ****** ***** *** *** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly i would like to say Big Thanks to Dr. Mamta Mishra for all the support medically and emotionally provided during this journey of 9 months. I still remember the day when my wife gave me the good news that soon we are going to have a cute baby in our life with this my search begin for a good doctor.In this era of internet i begin my search with practo and came across the profile of Dr. Mamta Mishra where i found all the feedbacks favourable to visit her. She is very polite who always encourages to go for normal delivery. She always provide ample amount of time to the patient being at face to face or on phone call. At times i bothered her during the odd times on call but she always provided the solution. One can send the reports to her on whatsapp and discuss it over call that act as saviour when you are out of town and cannot make a visit to her. She will not put you on lots of medicines rather encourage to have more fruits, vegetables,pulses etc. She understand the query of patients very well and explains the situation with all pros and cons and does not make you panic for unnecessary things.What i most like about her is the personal touch and understanding she renders in helping the patients.We wished normal delivery and it was the trust on her which gave us strength and made it happen. She put all her efforts for it.I would recommend anyone who is seeking medical advice related to gynae to visit Dr. Mishra. Once you visit her you will not go to any other doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I and my wife, Pooja visited Dr. Mamta at her clinic in Santushti apartments, Vasant Kunj during fourth month of the pregnancy. There few complications in our case. 
We found her treatment to be very professional taking care of all the possibilities.  Her more than two decades of experience  was visible in her treatment. She used to explain the things to us and also, addresses any query regarding anything . 
She has a very friendly approach towards patients. She is available on mobile in case of any emergency / urgent appointment. Even many a times, we used to watsapp the report if nothing else was required in that visit .
More than all this, we found her to be a lot more empathetic towards patients in comparison to other doctors ( we were consulting in Moolchand before her ). There's a personal touch to your case . She does her best to take care of everything. 
My wife opted for C section herself due to her suffering from minor heart issue (MVP) and we were scared after the complications in early stages of pregnancy. The doc said that normal delivery could be carried out, but only if she agrees. 

I wud definitely rate her 10/10 for her care and advises and wud visit her in future for related treatments for my wife.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were looking for a Gynaecologist in South Delhi and i find myself blessed to have come across Mamta ma'am through practo. She is supportive friendly and available on calls 24X7 which gives the patient so much confidence. I had to run to the doctor midnight and she was available on calls even then. very grateful for ma'am.

tags: None
review:
After my horrible experience with my previous Gynaecologist, I searched Practo and found Dr. mamta Mishra. My pregnancy has been successful only and only because of her. From the day I visited her, I re-gained faith on doctors!! 
She is extremely supportive, polite, patient and on your side be it whatever time and day. Not only on calls, she is easily approachable by any means at any time of day.
I went through appendectomy surgery during 8th month of my pregnancy and still had a normal delivery and ENTIRE credit og saving me n my lil one during surgery and post that too goes to only and only her. She gives you time as if she is consulting you on one - o - one basis.
Not only that, she will make sure that she will do everything to make it light on your pockets. No unnecessary tests or consultations or making you go for C sec just to make money. She even did not let me take an epidural :).

Thanks Dr. Mamta, you have been a life saviour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

review:
Pregnancy is the most beautiful phase in a women’s life, where one wants everything to be the best. Out of all things  one most important decision is to choose the best gynaecologist for your 9 months journey and i am glad that i chose Dr MAMTA MISHRA for my delivery. ******* *** ******** ** ******** she will guide you beforehand about everything that might going to persist in your case. 
She will be very frank with you regarding all the pros and cons related to your situation. She will not tense or burden you unnecessarily with tests and visits. 
I always wanted to have normal delivery and she is the one who actually made it happen. At delivery time i might have given up but she gave me strength nd motivation,not to give up and also put in all her efforts for it. Rest I can say just trust her completely and do what she tells you to do. Thanks maam for everything.

Both I and my wife are extremely satisfied with her approach and guidance. She gives ample time and till date we didn’t find her in rush as compared to other doctors are. 

Best part is that she listens your problem very patiently. She explains everything in detail. She is available 24X7 and respond to every single query if raised via WhatsApp. 

She is monitoring my wife’s pregnancy closely to ensure that both baby and mother remain healthy. 

She is trying her level best for normal delivery. Cheers. 

I recommend her to every person who requires attention and moral care from an Obstetrician/ Gynecologist doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,
review: Visited Dr. Mamta Mishra for advice as I was not able to conceive. She asked for couple of check ups and advised to try it naturally as nothing seemed wrong in the reports. Asked to spend time with the partner (we met on weekends only due to work). We still asked her if we could go for any alternate way. She explained in details about the other ways and clearly stated the success rate , she calmed us and pursued us to try it naturally. All went well by Gods grace and I delivered a healthy baby. She has always been very helpful like a guardian pre , during and post pregnancy. These days hardly you get to meet such Doctors who are ethical in their approach. We thank God for providing us the wisdom to approach Dr. Mamta Mishra.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Consulted Dr Mamta Mishra from the start of my pregnancy *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** *** *** *** ****She not only makes you comfortable but also gives you a very clear picture about your pregnancy. If its possible she will try her best for a normal delivery.I had myself given up in the labour room and requested her for a c-section but she denied that and encouraged me for a normal delivery. In the end, due to her support n encouragement I was able to deliver the baby normal. This is very much unlike the current scenario where the Doctors are very willing to go for a c section.I would highly recommend her as a Gynaecologist.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: ** ***** ****** ** ** ********* **** ************** My wife Anmol, was under her treatment throughout the pregnancy. From the very beginning, she made a very good emotional connect with my wife. She would give ample time, would entertain queries from the entire family, would spare time to take calls every single time. She made it all so comfortable that it all seemed so easy. Even in the labor room, she made her calm, discussed things with my wife before making any important decision. My wife's decision was given priority. There were chances in labor room, where it seemed that Doctors would go for C section. But, she motivated, guided, talked and encouraged my wife to do right things at the right moments in labor room which resulted in my wife's Normal Delivery. Hats off. True expert.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
A short time ago we blessed with a baby (normal delivery) and auspiciously  Dr. Mamta Mishra was our Gynaecologist. First of all she is very humble and listen all your problems prudently at the same time enlightening each and every pros and cons related to your problems so you may decide the best suitable option for you. She will never force you to visit all the time, from time to time she will ask you to send the soft copy of reports and if all OK you just need to follow the things as recommended.

We always wish for normal delivery and she is the one who actually made it happen. She always give you strength and push for normal delivery also ask you to have more vegetables and fruits along with normal workout rather than lot of medicines.

Thank you so much for all your friendliness, support and valuable guidance during the last 9 months.

I would recommend her to everyone.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Mamta Mishra is truly amazing. I live in a distant place, hundreds of kilometer from Delhi, where medical facilities are very limited. Even finding a qualified doctor is a big thing. Dr Mishra guided me over the telephone and advised me throughout my pregnancy. During my 34th week, I had some complication and was admitted in Fortis on the advice of Dr Mishra. Everyone was convinced including myself that it will be a C-Section but Dr Mishra insisted on natural delivery. I trusted her and she didn’t disappoint me. Finally I gave a birth through normal delivery.
 It was a preterm birth and my baby was admitted to the nursery for a week. There also Dr. Mishra was keeping a watch on my baby health and taking regular feedbacks from other doctors. I have never met a doctor who is so involved with their patients. Dr. Mishra is truly amazing

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dear Mam,

Thank you so much for being such an amazing doctor since January to me. I have never seen such a supportive and positive doctor ever.

I have been told by many people that always choose best doctor for yourself because it is very imp for our health.

When I became pregnant 🤰, my sister in law told me about you because both her cases has done by you and you handled them so well.

Many people has shared their experiences with me that their doctor was not good and they were not satisfied with their service and from their treatment.


Me and My husband as parents chose you as a Doctor for our baby. I had no trust on any other doctor as I was looking for good and skilled doctor. I got you and I have never seen such a friendly and brilliant doctor as you are.

Thank you once again Mamta Mishra Mam for being an amazing Doctor in my tough journey and I will recommend your name to my known people as well.


From Baby - Thank you Doctor for being an excellent Doctor to my parents and I am thankful to god and you for helping me to come in this world without any problem.


I want to advise everyone that must visit atleast for once to Mamta Mishra Mam and make your pregnancy journey positive and stress free ☺️👍

With love,
From Shivani (Mother) 
From Baby (Nakshatra).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were very lucky to find Dr. Mamta Mishra who made our parenthood blessful. She is such an experienced Gynecologist. I had placenta previa  which is a high risk pregnancy but under the guidance of Dr. Mamta Mishra it went very smooth. She treats her patients with compassion and cares about them. We visited her clinic in Vasant Kunj every month and apart from that she is always available over phone for any guidance. Even she calls back as well. tags: None
review:
To keep it short and simple I can just give all the credits to Dr. Mamta for my baby's NORMAL delivery. Also she saved a sure short expense of Rs 56000 in the process. When the baby was born he had an undeveloped sixth finger in his right hand. Just after delivery one of the doctors at Fortis told that the extra muscle will be cut off in a while but later I was told that the estimated cost of removing the muscle will be Rs 56000. 
Also a sense of very high level of urgency was maintained that there can be severe implications if the muscle isn't removed ASAP.
I Called Dr Mamta and made her aware of the whole story. You will be surprised to hear that not only she calmed us down but also took care of the muscle almost free of cost(compare 56000 with a mere 700 consulting fee).

I will just say that if in the current era of business minded doctors if you want an honest professional she is the one to go to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Her advices are superb , I use to visit her for my pregnancy and during my entire tenure she treated me the best way , me and my family were highly satisfied with her which is why we refer others also to see her . During my every visit she helped me a lot . She use to be always available on call as well as WhatsApp whenever I required. I had never seen any doctor doing that other than her.
In case you are searching for a good gynaecologist in NCR then Dr Mamta  Mishra is the one *** *** **** **** *
